content: **drops hat and scarf in alaska snow and fox** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ see knitted scarf pattern here 1 ~--------------------- **size** hat one-size **materials** note yardage shown is for the hat and the matching scarf 2 drops alaska from garnstudio 100g colour no 39 light grey/green and use drops snow from garnstudio 50g colour no 11 grey/green and use drops fox from garnstudio 50g colour no 04 green/beige drops crochet hook no 6 mm / us j 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/93-34-b---scarf 2 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/126886
